<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 225 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

You have entered a druidic circle and learned a few of the order’s secrets, granting you primal power.

<title level="3">Multiclass Druid characters</title>

The druid archetype can provide a bit of healing or elemental damage and can increase your utility in a natural environment with spells like [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) and [_meld into stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=188).
